title: Radu Buzescu
text:
Radu Buzescu was a <a href="Boyars%20of%20Wallachia%20and%20Moldavia">boyar</a> (noble) of <a href="Wallachia">Wallachia</a> during the reign of <a href="Michael%20the%20Brave">Michael the Brave</a>.
Biography.
Radu took part in important political and military events at the time. His brothers were <a href="Preda%20Buze%C8%99cu">Preda</a> and <a href="Stroe%20Buzescu">Stroe Buzescu</a>, the three forming the group of the <a href="Buze%C8%99ti%20brothers">Buzești brothers</a>. Together with them, he helped the <a href="voivode">voivode</a>s <a href="Michael%20the%20Brave">Michael the Brave</a> and <a href="Radu%20%C8%98erban">Radu Șerban</a> in battles, fulfilling various missions assigned to them. After the death of Michael, the Buzești brothers opposed <a href="Simion%20Movil%C4%83">Simion Movilă</a>'s short reign and helped Șerban to reach the throne of <a href="Wallachia">Wallachia</a> in October 1601. Enjoying a great political and military authority, they consistently supported the reign of Șerban.
Radu Buzescu, together with Preda Buzescu, is buried at the <a href="C%C4%83lui%20Monastery">Călui Monastery</a>.
